sourcesContent:
import './ExpenseItem.css' const expensedate = new Date(2021,4,23) const expensetitle = 'Insurance' const price = '3000/-' function ExpenseItem(props) { const day = props.date.toLocaleString('en-US',{day:'2-digit'}) const month = props.date.toLocaleString('en-US',{month:'long'}) const year = props.date.getFullYear return
{day}
{month}
{year}

{props.title}

{props.amount}
} export default ExpenseItem;
